name: El Cucuy
description:
El Cucuy is coming for you.  Search for a way to escape; find and collect objects along the way.

This game was made for:https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2017

Hope you enjoy it :) All feedback is welcome and greatly appreciated.

CONTROLS:
  • Use your Arrow Keys(also WASD) to move
  • Z to interact/pickup objects
  • F to turn your flashlight on or off
  • SPACE brings down your hud
LEAD PROGRAMMER:  Jonathan Camarena (aka Kyperbelt) - twitter - itch.io ART AND DESIGN: Mathalas :)
